scripts.build: npx rimraf dist && npx astro check && npx astro build
scripts.pm2: git pull && npx rimraf node_modules && npm i && npm run pm2:build && (pm2 stop digital-doppler || true)  && rm -rf ~/html/digital-doppler.bamboechop.at/* && cp -r dist/client/* ~/html/digital-doppler.bamboechop.at/ && pm2 start pm2.config.js
scripts.pm2:build: npx rimraf dist && && npm run db:migrate:deploy && npm run db:generate:types && npx astro build
